#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
long long int abs(long long int x)
{
	if(x<0)return -x;
	return x;
}

int main()
{
    int test;
    long long int e, o,temp;
    scanf("%d",&test);
    while(test!=0)
    {
        scanf("%lld%lld",&e,&o);

        if((e+o)%5==0)
        {
        temp=(e+o)/5;
        printf("%lld\n",abs(e-(temp*2)));

        }
        else{printf("-1\n");}

        test--;
    }

    return 0;
}
